name: Digi Ü Lite
description:
This App doesn't have the same features as the full version. It doesn't get many updates, but at least you can try it before you buy it.

With the full version of Digi Ü you can create your own Avatar and Save it to your Photo Gallery.

The real application has a growing selection of features, clothing, and items that you can customize your Avatar with.

The interface is very user friendly and easy to manipulate. I have personally created all of the images and Interface graphics.

If you have any suggestions please email me, my email address is listed on the Support page linked bellow.
